bugs.error_description: SQL injection vulnerability: direct string concatenation of user input 'username' into native SQL query without parameterization
NullPointerException risk: uses .get() on Optional without checking if present, will throw if address not found
NullPointerException risk: uses .get() on Optional without checking if present, will throw if user not found by username
Double password hashing vulnerability: passwordEncoder.encode(passwordEncoder.encode(dto.password())) applies BCrypt twice, weakening security
Inconsistent password encoding: creates new BCryptPasswordEncoder() instead of using injected passwordEncoder bean
Inconsistent password encoding: creates new BCryptPasswordEncoder() instead of using injected passwordEncoder bean
Missing @Validated annotation on controller class, validation groups on update method may not be processed
Incorrect pagination implementation: manually creates PageImpl with all data instead of using repository findAll(pageable), ignores actual pagination parameters
Security vulnerability: DELETE /users/{id} endpoint has no @PreAuthorize, allows unauthenticated deletion
Incomplete delete implementation: loads user but doesn't call repository.delete(), user is not actually deleted
Security risk in development: spring.jpa.show-sql=true exposes SQL queries in logs
